TABLE.NAME: block_activityfeedback
TABLE.COMMENT: feedback of users on activities for block activityfeedback

FIELD.NAME: cmid
FIELD.COMMENT: foreign key to id from table course_modules (for course and activity)

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: foreign key to id of table user

FIELD.NAME: fbid
FIELD.COMMENT: id for chosen feedback option, references config_plugins because feedback options are configurable

FIELD.NAME: fbname
FIELD.COMMENT: name of chosen feedback option because configured feedback options (value referenced by fbid) can change over time
